name: Darkness Falls - The Game
description:
A FPS Survival Horror game Developed by Gabriel Pilan de Carvalho.

Lost in the Darkness

Cold and confused you wake up on a rainy night, you don't know where you are or what's going on with your body, you've lost your things and there is nothing left but a note and a gun, time is running out...

The Game

Explore and Survive until you find what's going on and a way out, no one said surviving will be easy.
